experiment.title: DCM Precision Medicine Study Exomes: Sample SAM957
experiment.design_description: Base calls were generated in real-time on the instrument (RTA 2.7.6), and demultiplexed, unaligned BAM files were produced by Picard v1.111 ExtractIlluminaBarcodes and IlluminaBasecallsToSam.   Reads were aligned to the hs37d5(GRCh37) human reference using BWA v0.7.10.  Read-pairs not mapping within ± 2 standard deviations of the average library size (~150 ± 15 bp for exomes) were removed.  Aligned reads were further processed with Picard MarkDuplicates for duplicate removal, GATK v3. 2-2 IndelRealigner for realignment around short insertion-deletions, and GATK v3.2-2BaseRecalibrator for base quality score recalibration.

sample.title: Non-tumor DNA sample from Blood of a human male participant in the dbGaP study "Precision Medicine for Dilated Cardiomyopathy in European and African Ancestry"

attributes.study name: Precision Medicine for Dilated Cardiomyopathy in European and African Ancestry

study.title: Precision medicine for dilated cardiomyopathy in European and African ancestry
study.abstract: The DCM Precision Medicine Study is a multi-site consortium-based cross-sectional study of families with an embedded open-label randomized controlled trial. The aims of the study are to test the hypothesis that dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM) has a substantial genetic basis and to evaluate the effectiveness of a family communication intervention in improving the uptake of preventive screening and surveillance in at-risk first-degree relatives. The Study goal was to recruit 1,300 individuals (600 non-Hispanic African ancestry, 600 non-Hispanic European ancestry, and 100 Hispanic; 50% female) meeting rigorous diagnostic criteria for idiopathic DCM (probands) and 2,600 of their relatives. The probands were inpatients or outpatients identified by heart failure and cardiac transplant... (for more see dbGaP study page.)

experiment.design_description: 1 ug of total RNA were used to prepare small RNA library according to protocol of NEBNext Small RNA Library Prep Set for Illumina
